name: Jet Fighter Pilot
overview: Jet Fighter Pilot is a real-time 1-player text-based jet flying simulation for multiple systems. The player is placed in the cockpit of a modern jet aircraft, either the F-4. F-14, F-18, A-4, or A-6 aircraft. All current aspects of the aircraft's flight is displayed textually at the top of the screen. The player enters text commands to change altitude, flap position, tail hooks, brakes, and other aircraft settings. The player is armed with a select number of missiles, and can fire upon designated targets. The player can start in mid-flight, or choose to launch from an aircraft carrier.
